cleaning_workflow.description: Remove underscores and hyphens from City names and capitalize properly
Standardize State abbreviations to uppercase
Standardize BusinessType values
Clean Price column empty values and convert to number
Clean LoanAmount column empty values and convert to number
Standardize Date formats to yyyy-MM-dd
cleaning_workflow.expression: value.match(/^\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/) ? value.replace(/\//g,'-') : (value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/) ? value.split('-')[2]+'-'+value.split('-')[1]+'-'+value.split('-')[0] : (value.match(/^\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}$/) ? value.replace(/\./g,'-') : (value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}$/) ? value.split('/')[2]+'-'+value.split('/')[0]+'-'+value.split('/')[1] : (value.match(/^\d{4}_\d{2}_\d{2}$/) ? value.replace(/_/g,'-') : (value.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/) ? value : (value.match(/^\d{8}$/) ? value.substring(0,4)+'-'+value.substring(4,6)+'-'+value.substring(6,8) : value))))) ))

cleaning_workflow.description: Standardize Post_Date format to yyyy-MM-dd
cleaning_workflow.expression: value.match(/\d{4}[-\/.]\d{2}[-\/.]\d{2}/) ? value.replace(/[\/.]/, '-').replace(/[\/.]/, '-') : (value.match(/\d{2}[-\/.]\d{2}[-\/.]\d{4}/) ? (tokens = value.split(/[-\/.]/); tokens[2] + '-' + tokens[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + tokens[1].padStart(2,'0')) : value)

value.match(/\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}/) ? value : 
(value.match(/\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}/) ? (value.split('-')[2] + '-' + value.split('-')[1] + '-' + value.split('-')[0]) : 
(value.match(/\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}/) ? value.replace('.','-').replace('.','-') : 
(value.match(/\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}/) ? (value.split('/')[2] + '-' + value.split('/')[0] + '-' + value.split('/')[1]) : value)))

(value.match(/\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}/) != null ? value.replace(/\./g, '-') :
(value.match(/Dec \d{1,2} \d{4}/) != null ? new Date(value).toISOString().slice(0,10) :
(value.match(/Dec-\d{2}-\d{4}/) != null ? new Date(value).toISOString().slice(0,10) :
(value.match(/^\d{8}$/) != null ? value.slice(0,4) + '-' + value.slice(4,6) + '-' + value.slice(6,8) :

cleaning_workflow.expression: if(value.match(/\d{4}[\/\.-]\d{2}[\/\.-]\d{2}/)) { value.replace('.','-').replace('/','-') } else if(value.match(/\d{2}[\/\.-]\d{2}[\/\.-]\d{4}/)) { var parts = value.split(/[\/\.-]/); parts[2] + '-' + parts[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + parts[1].padStart(2,'0') } else if(value.match(/[A-Za-z]{3} \d{2} \d{4}/)) { date.parse(value).toString('yyyy-MM-dd') } else { '' }

cleaning_workflow.expression: if(value.match(/^\d{4}\/\d{2}\/\d{2}$/)) { value.replace('/', '-').replace('/', '-') } else if(value.match(/^\d{2}-\d{2}-\d{4}$/)) { var parts = value.split('-'); parts[2] + '-' + parts[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + parts[1].padStart(2,'0') } else if(value.match(/^\d{4}-\d{2}-\d{2}$/)) { value } else if(value.match(/^\d{2}\/\d{2}\/\d{4}$/)) { var parts = value.split('/'); parts[2] + '-' + parts[0].padStart(2,'0') + '-' + parts[1].padStart(2,'0') } else if(value.match(/^\d{4}\.\d{2}\.\d{2}$/)) { value.replace(/\./g, '-') } else { null }
